title: Trauma-Responsive Nursing Leadership: Flexible Microlearning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Nursing Management Knowledge and Leadership Experience
context.additional_context: Trauma response competency development for nursing managers in healthcare corporations. Composed of 5-10 minute mobile-based learning modules

learning_goals: Learners can classify team members' mental health status into three levels in trauma-inducing situations
Learners can propose measures to reduce role overload among team members by 30% using flexible work scheduling strategies
Learners can apply a weekly trauma self-assessment protocol through microlearning content
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
